result.reason: Feature request to test all connection TCP ports is well-scoped — existing PortScanner.IsPortOpen() and PortScanWindow UI patterns make this straightforward to implement.
result.approach: Add 'Test All Connections' menu item to Tools menu that iterates ConnectionTreeModel.GetRecursiveChildList(), calls existing PortScanner.IsPortOpen() for each connection's host:port, and displays results in a new ObjectListView-based window (following PortScanWindow pattern). Support async testing with progress indicator and timeout handling.
